info.title: Captain Data MCP API
info.description: MCP API for managing Captain Data actions.

get.description: Check if the API is running

post.summary: Authenticate with your Captain Data API key
post.description: Exchange your Captain Data API key for a session token that can be used for subsequent requests

session_token.description: Session token to use in Authorization header for subsequent requests

get.description: Get metadata about available tools (MCP introspection)

parameters.name: v
parameters.description: Version parameter. Use "full" to get all tools

post.description: Find a person's LinkedIn profile by their name. Use this when you have someone's name and optionally their company, and need to find their LinkedIn profile URL. Perfect for starting lead research when you only have basic contact information.

full_name.description: The full name of the person you want to find on LinkedIn.

company_name.description: The company name to help narrow down the search results. Highly recommended for common names.

post.description: Search for people using a Sales Navigator compliant query. Use this when you need to find potential leads, candidates, or contacts based on specific criteria like job title, company, location, or skills. Great for building prospect lists or finding experts in a particular field.

query.description: A Sales Navigator People search compliant query param. Please copy the entire value of the query parameter from your Sales Navigator search URL (everything after ?query=) and paste it here.

post.description: Extract detailed information from a LinkedIn profile. Use this when you need comprehensive data about a person including their work history, education, skills, and achievements. Perfect for lead research, candidate evaluation, or networking preparation.

li_profile_url.description: The LinkedIn profile URL to extract data from. Must be a valid LinkedIn URL starting with 'https://www.linkedin.com/sales/people/', 'https://www.linkedin.com/sales/lead/', 'https://www.linkedin.com/pub/' or 'https://www.linkedin.com/in/'

full_enrich.description: Extract experiences, skills and highlights. Set to true for comprehensive profile data.

post.description: Find a company's LinkedIn page by name. Use this when you have a company name and need to find their LinkedIn profile URL. Essential for starting B2B research or company analysis.

company_name.description: The name of the company you want to find on LinkedIn.

post.description: Search for companies using a Sales Navigator compliant query. Use this when you need to find target companies based on industry, size, location, or other criteria. Ideal for building target account lists or market analysis.

query.description: A Sales Navigator account search compliant query parameter. Copy the entire value after ?query= from your Sales Navigator search URL.

post.description: Extract comprehensive company information from LinkedIn. Use this when you need detailed data about a company including size, industry, location, and key insights. Ideal for market research, competitive analysis, or B2B prospecting.

li_company_url.description: The LinkedIn company page URL to extract data from. Must be a valid LinkedIn URL starting with 'https://www.linkedin.com/sales/company', 'https://www.linkedin.com/showcase', 'https://www.linkedin.com/company' or 'https://www.linkedin.com/school'

post.description: Search for employees of a specific company. Use this when you need to find people working at a particular organization. Perfect for identifying key contacts, decision-makers, or potential leads within target companies.

company_uid.description: The Captain Data unique identifier for the company. Get this from search_companies or enrich_company first.

post.description: Get current workspace quota and billing information. Use this to check your remaining credits, usage statistics, and billing cycle dates. Helpful for monitoring API consumption and planning usage.

name.description: The name of the workspace (maximum 55 characters)
